content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is enough space and no existing entities at the target position before placing a new entity. Consider adjusting the spacing, direction, or reference position to avoid collisions.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory
- Before attempting to insert items into a furnace or any entity, ensure that the required items are available in the inventory.
